example_reflection.prompt: Build me a website for my artisan coffee roastery

conversation.content: Build me a website for my artisan coffee roastery

I'll create a sophisticated website for your artisan coffee roastery. This will showcase your craft roasts with a mirror-backed design that reflects the depth of your coffee's flavor profiles. The site will feature dynamic menu displays, origin stories, and a vault-connected ordering system.
